_description: The opening stanza of nine lines of a fragment of a fourteenth-century miracle play, preceded by its French equivalent — twelve lines in 6-line tail-rhyme stanzas

BLAddRoll63481.First Lines:
Lordinges wytouten lesingeYe weten wel that i am
                    kinge…
